Attuned Privacy Policy

EQIQ K.K. (hereinafter, the "Company") provides services related to (i) having individuals (hereinafter, the "Subjects") answer questions and provide the results thereof to the Company's customers (hereinafter, the "Customers") to for the use of, among others, improve human resource management and conduct analyses to improve the working environment, and (ii) providing various information through email services accompanying thereto.

For the Justin application, here is an explanation of how it accesses, uses, stores, and/or shares Google user data: We securely store the event start and end times and participant identifiers for all calendar events that users have given us permission to read.
